intro.headline: You think it, we create it
intro.description: Visual identity, creative strategy, and digital storytelling for brands that matter.

founder.title: Meet the founder
founder.quote: Design isn't just how it looks — it's how it makes people feel. Minusu was born from the desire to simplify noise into meaning.
founder.bio: From sketching logos in notebooks to building emotional brand systems, my journey's been rooted in clarity and curiosity. I created Minusu as a space for design that dares to feel.
founder.name: Javier

cards.title: Complete Online Presence
cards.subtitle: Unified digital brand experience
cards.description: We craft cohesive, cross-platform brand experiences from visuals to website, working closely with our trusted partners at Page 1 Studios for expert website development. Together, we ensure your brand is seamless, strategic, and built to grow.

cards.title: Social Media
cards.subtitle: Strategy-driven storytelling
cards.description: We design impactful content strategies tailored to your brand voice. From content creation to community management, we help you build an authentic presence that sparks engagement and strengthens connection.

cards.title: Product Design
cards.subtitle: Purposeful, human-first design
cards.description: We design intuitive digital and physical products that solve real-world problems. Every detail is crafted with care—balancing functionality, emotion, and aesthetic clarity.

cards.title: Brand Identity
cards.subtitle: Distinctive, emotion-led branding
cards.description: We develop complete brand systems—from logos to tone of voice—that tell your story with intention. Our process brings consistency and soul to every brand touchpoint.

cards.title: Logo Design
cards.subtitle: Strategic mark-making
cards.description: We create timeless, meaningful logos that anchor your identity. Every mark is designed to be versatile, memorable, and aligned with your brand's purpose.

quotes.name: Amira Shah
quotes.quote: Minusu didn't just elevate our visuals—they helped us communicate who we really are.

quotes.name: Luca Moretti
quotes.quote: The brand system they created gave us clarity and confidence. It's more than design, it's identity.

quotes.name: Sophie Grant
quotes.quote: Every detail felt intentional. Working with Javier was seamless and inspiring from start to finish.

quotes.name: Daniel Osei
quotes.quote: Our audience engagement doubled after launch. Minusu's work made a real, measurable difference.

quotes.name: Talia Rhodes
quotes.quote: Creative, strategic, and beautifully executed. I finally feel proud to share our brand with the world.

quotes.name: Jonas Becker
quotes.quote: Minusu captured the heart of our brand in a way we never could on our own—it's design that *feels*.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Ready to start your project? Get in touch and let's create something extraordinary together.
